title: Introducing: Cliff Airey
body:
I’ve heard whispers about Bristol’s electronic music scene being really on the up, and I don’t mean students buying CDJs and attempting to replicate David Guetta.

Whilst this may be the first I’ve heard of producer **Cliff Airey**, and the details are vague thus far, the quality of newest release, _Moments_, speaks for itself. A dense, atmospheric journey, it’s simplistic yet possessing an otherworldly sense of beauty. Check out Moments below, and keep up with Cliff Airey via [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Cliff-Airey/544979352225653?fref=ts).
